name: Use of OpenConsole
description: Detects usage of OpenConsole binary as a LOLBIN to launch other binaries to bypass application Whitelisting
note: **Detection Rule without Regex for better understanding. Be careful, this way is case sensitive:**`((process.pe.original_file_name:OpenConsole.exe OR process.executable:*\\OpenConsole.exe) AND (NOT (process.executable:C\:\\Program\ Files\\WindowsApps\\Microsoft.WindowsTerminal*)))`
